Dear {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}} {{lead.Last Name:default=Valued Operator}},
For over 70 years H+S Aviation has been supporting airlines from across Europe, the Middle East, Africa and the Far East with world-class Auxiliary Power Unit (APU) maintenance, repair and overhaul services. Airlines have come to rely on H+S to minimise the impact on aircraft availability, performance and passenger satisfaction through APU faults and failures.
As an authorised Honeywell service centre for the 36-150 series APUs, we are proud to serve commercial and private operators of 36-150-equipped BAE, Dornier, Embraer and Fokker aircraft from our state-of-the-art repair and test facility in Portsmouth UK, supported by our Field Service Teams.
Selecting H+S Aviation as your 36-150 APU partner, brings the following valuable benefits:
- Best-in-class turn times - Exchange material for urgent needs - Competitive pricing - High-quality customer service
Most of all, you’ll receive a team focused on meeting your requirements and exceeding your expectations. For more information on our Honeywell 36-150 APU capabilities, please click below.
Lisa Cooper Commercial Manager - Engine Sales Team H+S Aviation
